parameters.description: Nickname of the user to retrieve

post.summary: Register a new user in the system.

full_name.description: The full name of the user

nickname.description: The nickname or username of the user

email.description: The email address of the user

email_verified.description: Whether the email has been verified

picture.description: URL to the user's profile picture

auth0id.description: The Auth0 ID of the user

birth_date.description: The birth date of the user

user.description: The complete newly created user object

400.description: Invalid or missing data in the request

get.summary: Get competitors data for a specific coin by name
get.description: This endpoint retrieves a list of competitors for the analyzed coin based on the provided coin name.

parameters.name: coin_name
parameters.description: The name of the coin to get competitors for

400.description: Bad request - Coin name is required

404.description: Not found - CoinBot not found or no data for the requested coin

message.example: CoinBot not found for the given coin name

get.summary: Retrieve cryptocurrency events based on specified filters.
get.description: This endpoint queries the Coindar API to retrieve events related to cryptocurrencies, filtered by date range, coin IDs, tags, and sorting options.

parameters.name: today_date
parameters.description: The lower limit of the event start date in the format yyyy-mm-dd (optional)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The upper date limit of the event start date in the format yyyy-mm-dd (optional)

parameters.name: filter_coins
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of cryptocurrency IDs related to the requested events (optional)

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Parameter defining events sorting; possible values are 'date_start', 'date_added', or 'views' (optional)

parameters.name: filter_tags
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of tag IDs (optional)

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Sorting order; possible values are '0' (ascending) or '1' (descending) (optional)

get.summary: Retrieve economic events based on specified filters.
get.description: This endpoint queries the Profit API to retrieve economic events related to forex, filtered by date range, country ISO, currency, and impact.

parameters.name: country_iso
parameters.description: The country ISO code (optional). Expected values are 'US', 'GB', 'CN'.

parameters.name: impact
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of impact levels ('high', 'medium', 'low') (optional).

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The lower limit of the event start date in the format yyyy-mm-dd (optional).

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The upper limit of the event end date in the format yyyy-mm-dd (optional).

url.description: The URL of the API request

success.description: Indicates if the operation was successful

url.description: The URL of the API request

success.description: Indicates if the operation was successful

url.description: The URL of the API request

success.description: Indicates if the operation was successful

post.summary: Create a session with CapitalCom
post.description: Creates a session with the CapitalCom API using the provided email (identifier) and password.

identifier.description: The email address of the user

data.description: The response data from CapitalCom API if successful

success.description: Indicates if the operation was successful

X-SECURITY-TOKEN.description: Security token returned by the API

CST.description: Session token returned by the API

400.description: Bad request - missing or invalid identifier/password

get.summary: CapitalCom Prices - Retrieve historical prices for a specific symbol
get.description: Queries the CapitalCom API to retrieve historical price data for a given financial instrument, based on the provided symbol and resolution.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The symbol of the financial instrument

parameters.name: resolution
parameters.description: The time resolution for the price data, such as 'MINUTE', 'HOUR', or 'DAY' (default is 'HOUR')

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: The maximum number of data points to retrieve, between 1 and 1000

success.description: Indicates if the operation was successful

400.description: Bad request - Invalid or missing parameters

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid session or security token

get.summary: Coinalyze - etrieve funding rates for specified symbols
get.description: This endpoint retrieves historical funding rates for a list of specified symbols from the Coinalyze API.

parameters.name: symbols
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of symbols to retrieve funding rates for.

success.description: Indicates if the operation was successful.

400.description: Bad request - Invalid symbol parameter or symbol is missing.

get.summary: TwelveData - Retrieve historical time series data for a specified symbol
get.description: This endpoint queries the TwelveData API to retrieve historical time series data for a given financial symbol, based on the provided interval and output size.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The symbol of the financial instrument

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: The time interval for the data points, such as '1min', '1h', or '1day'

parameters.name: outputsize
parameters.description: The maximum number of data points to retrieve

success.description: Indicates if the operation was successful

404.description: Not Found - The specified symbol was not found

post.summary: Retrieve alerts for multiple categories
post.description:
Retrieve alerts for multiple categories with timeframe filtering and pagination support.
    
the endpoint allows filtering alerts by timeframe (1h, 4h, 1d, 1w) extracted from the alert name.
results are ordered by creation date (newest first) with optional pagination.

error.example: Invalid timeframe. Must be one of: 1h, 4h, 1d, 1w

post.summary: Retrieve alerts for multiple coins
post.description:
Retrieve alerts for multiple coins with timeframe filtering and pagination support.
    
the endpoint allows filtering alerts by timeframe (1h, 4h, 1d, 1w) extracted from the alert name.
results are ordered by creation date (newest first) with optional pagination.

error.example: Invalid timeframe. Must be one of: 1h, 4h, 1d, 1w

get.summary: Get list of available cryptocurrencies
get.description:
Retrieve a comprehensive list of all available cryptocurrencies from coingecko.
    
this endpoint is cached for 24 hours (86400 seconds) to optimize performance and reduce api calls.

get.summary: Get detailed tokenomics data for a cryptocurrency
get.description:
Retrieve comprehensive tokenomics information about a specific cryptocurrency using its coingecko id.
    
the endpoint fetches data from both coingecko and coinmarketcap (for whitepaper if not available in coingecko).

parameters.name: coin_id
parameters.description: CoinGecko ID of the cryptocurrency (e.g., "bitcoin", "ethereum")

404.description: Cryptocurrency not found or API error

get.summary: Get last analysis
get.description: Retrieve the name and date of the last analysis created
